interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Heatless Curling Rod Headband Silk 6A 35mm with 1 Clip and 2 Silk Hair Ties No Heat Curls Overnight Curly Ribbon For Hair Tools Sleep In Curler Rollers Head Wrap for Sleeping Long Hair Wave Kit
Review Date: 2021/10/28
Store: wedofever
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Brand': 'Wedofever', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '37 x 1.38 x 1.38 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '37 x 1.38 x 1.38 inches; 6.74 Ounces'}
Review Text: The idea of easy waves is so appealing to me. I work in a high school and get up at 5am so blow drying my hair is just too much. You have to take a bit to get this right but it does work. I actually replaced the inner part of the tube and put softer cotton filling inside it so it was more comfortable to sleep on. Definitely worth a try!
Review Title: Learning curve but works!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Amtidy Solid Color Vintage Modern Style Elastic Women's Rhinestone Crown Tiara, Bridal Wedding Dance Party Birthday Party Women's Headband Tiara, Queen Tiara With Comb（Silver） Amtidy {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Amtidy', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.65 x 5.63 x 3.23 inches; 12.03 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931993780'} These headbands are really nice quality. They are like women’s stocking or tights fabric. The colors are very vibrant and the bands are stitched so the knot stays in place. I can’t quite figure out how to style them but overall they are cute, great quality, and good value.
If you found this review helpful please click “helpful” below. Thank you. Vibrant colors, soft, good quality. Messy Bun Hair Piece Scrunchy Hair Extensions Tousled Updo Ponytail With Synthetic Hair Elastic Rubber Band Accessories Light Warm Brown Aileam {'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 4.2 x 1.2 inches; 0.49 Ounces', 'UPC': '780682649574'} This messy bun hair piece does look exactly like the additional photos in the add. However, it doesn’t look anything like the woman’s hair in the main/first picture. I snapped some photos of me wrapping it around my bun and then just adding it to a “messy bun”. If you want more volume it definitely works! I didn’t quite get the right color so it doesn’t work perfectly for me. It’s hard to pick a color on a screen but it wasn’t too far off. If you are doing a lot of zoom meetings this can help add some volume and change up your look. Since the cameras aren’t extremely clear it definitely would pass for me as part of my bun. It came with a fun colorful hair tie and some Bobby pins. Adds volume. Try to match your color. Folora 4pcs Premium 1 Inch Wide Solid Color Floral Plaid Headband Set for Women Girls, Blue-2 Folora {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Folora', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.98 x 5.51 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLR-HB-4pcs Blue-2'} These headbands are very good quality and beautiful blue colors. They are light weight and have a little suede lining which helps them stay put. I got these to spruce up my zoom meeting. they make a nice accessory. My 3YO even looks adorable in one. Since they are light they do not hurt while wearing them. Great value. Beautiful lightweight headbands that don’t hurt your head. Nxconsu 8Pcs Rhinestone Headbands for Women Girls Teens Kids Fashion Comfort No Hurting Hair Accessories Thin Hair Bands Crystal Exquisite Color Selection Nxconsu {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Fabric Type': 'Rhinestone', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 6.77 x 1.54 inches; 8.5 Ounces'} I love to wear headbands to jazz up my zoom meetings. However, they usually hurt my head. I wore these all day with no issues which is insane. I found t get a picture to give these headbands justice. They are very simple with just a little shine and I think are so very cute. The value is great as well since you get so many for the low price. Definitely recommend. The colors are gorgeous. Gorgeous colors, shine and comfortable. 2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands MEETWIN {} Love love love these towels. They are great quality. They are thick and very pretty. I love the wooden button. I’ve had a few sets of these types of towels and I like these the best. They are thick and really absorb water. They also stay tightly wrapped which is much needed when you have a lot of wet hair. I prefer the twist over the cap type towel. The two extra velvet scrunches are a nice as on too. Definitely recommend. Great value for the price. Thick, absorbent, and nice quality. Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories YanJie {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Package Dimensions': '10.12 x 7.6 x 1.22 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682099'} These Holiday Minnie Ears are adorable. I am so excited to wear them this season. They are shiny and really beautiful and festive. I gave 4 stars because when you are close up you can see the hot glue used in the center but when their on no one would notice. They fit me well. My 4yo loves to wear them but when she looks down they slide down off her head but that’s because her head is too small. She loves the colors too! Very festive! Hair Scarf Scrunchies Organizer, Hanging Hair Ribbon Bow Scrunchies Holder, Hair Ties Bowknot Ponytail Storage Display Stand for Women Girls (yellow) PACMAXI {'Color': 'Yellow', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'PACMAXI', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Item Weight': '175 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '12.05 x 8 x 1.5 inches; 6.17 Ounces'} This is great! I have a ton of head bands and can now hang them on this as well as my other hangers on the wall. This really spaces them out for easy viewing. I could also add hair ties and necklaces and scrunchies. It’s versatile so you can use it for a bunch of things. It would also be great in my daughters room. The metal hooks are sharp though so be careful putting them in but they seem to hold well. The price is great for this item. Holds a lot of different things. Rhinestone Crystal Diamond Headbands for Women Luxury Shiny Padded Diamond Headband Hair Hoops Fashion Hair Accessories for Girls Bejewelled Hairband Sparkly Party Headband (Rainbow) YMSGIRL {'Material': 'Pearl, Polyester, Plastic, Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Brand': 'YMSGIRL', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 3.94 inches; 3.17 Ounces'} This headband is beautiful. The gems sparkle and the colors are vibrant. There are small and larger gems lines up. The inside of the headband is felt and really keeps it in place. It stands out from the head a lot which is the style. Definitely recommend! Beautiful. Beautiful gems! KISSIO Black Mascara,Double-ended Mascara,Mascara 2 in 1,Black Thick Mascara,Stereotype & Thick,Clear Roots,Effective for 12 hours,2 Step,1 Tube KISSIO {'Color': 'black', 'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} This mascara works great! It is waterproof so stays on and definitely lasts. I had to use makeup remover/face wash to get it all off. It has one end that is comb like and is a primer which you do first. Then you use the tiny mascara wand next night actually like the tiny wand. It makes it easier to get the inside and outside lashes. The color is a dark black and goes on well. I definitely recommend! Stays put mascara. Heatless Curling Rod Headband Silk 6A 35mm with 1 Clip and 2 Silk Hair Ties No Heat Curls Overnight Curly Ribbon For Hair Tools Sleep In Curler Rollers Head Wrap for Sleeping Long Hair Wave Kit wedofever {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material': 'Silk, Cotton', 'Brand': 'Wedofever', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '37 x 1.38 x 1.38 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '37 x 1.38 x 1.38 inches; 6.74 Ounces'} The idea of easy waves is so appealing to me. I work in a high school and get up at 5am so blow drying my hair is just too much. You have to take a bit to get this right but it does work. I actually replaced the inner part of the tube and put softer cotton filling inside it so it was more comfortable to sleep on. Definitely worth a try! Learning curve but works!

actual_interaction.text: The idea of easy waves is so appealing to me. I work in a high school and get up at 5am so blow drying my hair is just too much. You have to take a bit to get this right but it does work. I actually replaced the inner part of the tube and put softer cotton filling inside it so it was more comfortable to sleep on. Definitely worth a try!
